prodNameC: "西門子" 甲狀腺球蛋白自體抗體試劑組
ingredientsDesc: (1) ADVIA Centaur aTG: lite reagent: human thyroglobulin (~0.38 ug/mL) labeled with acridinium ester in buffer with BSA, sodium azide (<0.1%), protein stabilizers, and preservatives.solid phase: polyclonal human anti-Tg antibody (~1.98 ug/mL) bound to polyclonal goat anti-human antibody (~49.5 ug/mL) covalently coupled to paramagnetic particles in buffer with BSA, sodium azide (<0.1%) and preservatives.(2) aTG, 1,2, quality control material (3 vials for each level, 2 mL/vial): various levels of anti-Tg in human plasma with sodium azide (<0.1%) and preservatives.(3) Calibrator 1 (2 vials for each level, 1 mL/vial): low or high levels of anti-Tg in human plasma with sodium azide (<0.1%) and preservative
applicantName: 西門子醫療設備股份有限公司
applicantAddr: 台北市南港區園區街3號2樓之2
efficacy: 本產品適用於ADVIA Centaur、ADVIA Centaur XP、ADVIA Centaur CP分析儀，定量測定血清或含EDTA血漿中的甲狀腺球蛋白自體抗體濃度。

mdKind.mdKindMCodeName: C 免疫學及微生物學裝置

factoryDtoList.factoryAddr: 333 CONEY ST. EAST WALPOLE, MA 02032, U.S.A.
